# List of parishes in Prince Edward Island

This is a list of parishes for the Canadian province of Prince Edward Island.
Prince County
*North Parish
*Egmont Parish
*Halifax Parish
*Richmond Parish
*St. David's Parish
Queens County
*Grenville Parish
*Hillsboro Parish
*Charlotte Parish
*Bedford Parish
*St. John's Parish
Kings County
*St. Patrick's Parish
*East Parish
*St. George's Parish
*St. Andrew's Parish
